sections.1_story: Imagine you are driving a car and want to know how long it will take to reach your destination. Time, Speed & Distance helps you calculate travel time, speed, or distance.

5_exam_examples.question: A car covers 150 km in 3 hours. What is the speed?
A train travels at 60 km/hr for 2 hours and 80 km/hr for 3 hours. Find average speed.
solution_steps: Total distance = 360 km, Total time = 5 hrs

5_exam_examples.question: A man walks at 5 km/hr and returns at 3 km/hr. Find average speed.
Two trains move in opposite directions at 40 km/hr and 60 km/hr. Find relative speed.
A boat goes 24 km downstream in 2 hrs and returns in 3 hrs. Find speed of boat in still water.
A train 120 m long passes a pole in 6 seconds. Find speed in km/hr.
A car travels 60 km at 30 km/hr and 60 km at 60 km/hr. Find average speed.
solution_steps: Total distance = 120 km, Total time = 2+1=3 hrs

5_exam_examples.question: A man covers 100 km at 25 km/hr. How much time?
A train travels 90 km at 45 km/hr. Find time taken.
